content: crochet a cute little chick with this quick and easy no-sew pattern the finished amigurumi chicks are a great size for keychains and are perfect for easter or quick market makes use as decor pop into easter baskets or use in your easter egg hunts the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy the free written pattern can be found here 1 on my blog **materials** * dk weight chenille yarn * dk weight yarn * 3mm crochet hook * 5mm safety eyes * polyester fiberfill * yarn needle stitch marker scissors the finished item measures approximately 1 5 tall by 2 5 wide 4cm x 5cm item size may vary depending on the materials used 1 https //www stitchbyfay com/no-sew-chick-crochet-pattern/
